content.text:
This principle involves the distribution of visual weight and is achieved by the way details are grouped. Balance in Garments...<image 1>

A. Proximity
B. Alignment
C. Contrast
D. Unity

The image shows a dress with a symmetrical pattern and design, which suggests that the principle being referred to is:

A. Proximity

Proximity refers to the grouping of elements that are close to each other, creating a sense of balance and harmony. In this case, the symmetrical pattern and the even distribution of the design elements across the dress demonstrate how proximity can be used to achieve balance in garments.
Now, output the final answer and nothing else:
